db:info.db:title: Qt Virtual Keyboard C++ Classes
db:info.db:edition: Qt Virtual Keyboard | Commercial or GPLv3

db:abstract.db:para: Provides classes to implement input methods for virtual keyboards.

db:article.db:para: Provides classes to implement input methods for virtual keyboards.

db:listitem.db:para: Contains enums used by the virtual keyboard classes.
The base class for input methods.
An application-defined dictionary for virtual keyboard input methods.
Provides access to an input context.
The InputEngine class provides an input engine that supports C++ and QML integration.
Acts as a hub for keyboard event notifications.
Trace is a data model for touch input data.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: To include the definitions of the module's classes, use the following directive:

db:section.db:title: Using the Module
db:section.db:para: Using a Qt module requires linking against the module library, either directly or through other dependencies. Several build tools have dedicated support for this, including CMake and qmake.

db:section.db:title: Building with CMake
db:section.db:para: Use the find_package() command to locate the needed module components in the Qt6 package:
db:section.db:programlisting: find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS VirtualKeyboard) target_link_libraries(mytarget PRIVATE Qt6::VirtualKeyboard)
db:section.db:para: See Getting started with CMake for more information.

db:section.db:title: Building with qmake
